home.heroSubtitle: Explore the Unknown Frontiers of Technology
home.heroDescription: Here, we are committed to discovering and promoting cutting-edge tech products, bringing you unique digital experiences.

hero.description: We are committed to connecting Russia's most promising esports channel partners, professional clubs, and content creators to collaboratively promote high-performance peripheral brands and drive the professionalization and commercialization of the Russian esports market.

features.description: With strict quality control, global supply chain networks, and professional service teams, we provide Russian customers with the most reliable peripheral supply chain solutions.

testimonials.subtitle: CUSTOMER TESTIMONIALS
testimonials.title: Customer Reviews
testimonials.description: Real evaluations from partners, witnessing our professional services and quality products' good performance in the market.

testimonial1.content: Working with MistyIslet for three years, their product quality and service level are excellent. Timely delivery, stable product quality, they are our most trusted partner.

testimonial2.content: Professional team, quality products, reasonable prices. MistyIslet helped us establish a comprehensive supply chain system, business grew by 200%.

testimonial3.content: As a partner in the Far East region, MistyIslet provides us with professional cross-border trade services. High customs clearance efficiency, strict risk control.

cta.title: Become Our Partner
cta.description: Whether you are a brand owner or channel partner, we look forward to establishing long-term stable cooperation with you to jointly explore market opportunities.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Pioneers Focused on Technological Innovation
about.heroSubtitle: We focus on providing high-end peripheral supply chain services for Russian merchants, committed to building the most professional and reliable cross-border trade bridge.
about.heroDescription: Connecting Chinese and Russian markets for four years, we have always adhered to quality as the core and innovation as the driving force to create value for customers.

story.subtitle: SINCE 2018
story.title: We have been writing
story.titleLine2: new chapters in China-Russia cross-border trade
story.description: For six years, we have focused on peripheral supply chain services, continuously innovating and optimizing to provide customers with the highest quality products and service experience.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To become an important bridge for China-Russia supply chain cooperation, providing Russian merchants with high-quality peripheral products and professional supply chain services.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To become a globally leading cross-border supply chain service provider, enabling high-quality products from around the world to flow more conveniently.

coreValues.title: Core Values
coreValues.description: Integrity-based, quality first, customer first, building a mutually beneficial ecosystem.

timeline.subtitle: HISTORY
timeline.title: Development Journey
timeline.description: From startup to growth, we have always adhered to our original intention, writing new chapters in cross-border trade with professionalism and persistence.

2024.title: Company Establishment
2024.description: MistyIslet was established in Hangzhou, China, focusing on China-Russia supply chain services

2025.title: Market Expansion
2025.description: Comprehensive cooperation with local merchants in Russia

2026.title: In Progress
2026.description: Expected - Introduction of AI technology to optimize supply chain management and improve efficiency
